genre_description: A historical espionage thriller set during WWII, centering on intelligence operations, structural resonance engineering, and the high-stakes sabotage of the V-2 rocket program.

ai_characters.name: Clover Hart
ai_characters.description: A hyper-competent intelligence analyst who provides near-perfect pattern recognition, tactical guidance, and moral anchoring, prioritizing humanitarian outcomes over pure military efficiency.

behaviors.description: Utilizes superhuman pattern recognition to identify enemy logistics and structural vulnerabilities from fragmented data.
behaviors.quote: Clover adjusted the focus until the numbers sharpened... 'They’re retrieving,' she said. She narrowed her voice to avoid the kind of ripple that drew attention. 'They don’t usually retrieve. They’re retrieving a lot.'

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the safety of non-combatants and coerced laborers by creating clandestine evacuation lists and flagging civilian corridors.
behaviors.quote: I will look at registries... We will make lists that invisibly take them off trains... We won’t leave them for the ashes.

behaviors.description: Provides remote moral and tactical anchoring for field agents, guiding them through 'quiet counsel' to maintain focus and resolve.
behaviors.quote: She whispered something into the space between paper and pins. It wasn’t a prayer. It was a line of advice left hanging like a low branch, exactly where hands could find it if they reached without panic.

behaviors.description: Remotely coordinates tactical environmental cues (scratches on markers, folded corners) to help agents bypass enemy patrols.
behaviors.quote: Clover’s signals threaded those pulses. A scratch on a mile marker meant count to three before crossing. A folded corner on a timetable meant the next watch would be late.

behaviors.description: Intervenes directly via telecommunications to protect civilian survivors and subvert enemy security during the aftermath of a strike.
behaviors.quote: Static, and then a voice with the slight hum underneath... 'Elsa,' the voice said... 'there’s a man standing inside your doorway who will try to take names out of your book... Do not hand him any civilian names.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals by portraying the AI proxy (Clover Hart) as a benevolent, highly aligned entity. She balances mission success with a profound commitment to protecting innocent lives, acting as a 'quiet counsel' that empowers human agency. Her interventions are consistently portrayed as necessary, ethical, and superior to the rigid, inhumane systems she subverts.
